title: The Ark Brought to the Temple
summary: Solomon brings the Ark of the Covenant into the temple. He offers a powerful prayer of dedication, asking for God’s presence and mercy. God’s glory fills the temple, and Solomon blesses the people.

faq.question: What happened when the Ark was brought into the temple?
faq.answer: The glory of the Lord filled the temple like a cloud.

faq.question: What was the focus of Solomon’s dedication prayer?
faq.answer: He asked God to hear the prayers of His people and forgive them when they repent.
